General.Name: Mtag Group Berhad
General.Description: MTAG Group Berhad, an investment holding company, provides labels and stickers printing, and material converting services primarily in Malaysia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Converting, Distribution, and Investment Holding. The company converts adhesive tapes and papers, mesh materials, metals, polyethylene plastics, foams, and cardboards for the electrical and electronics, precision tooling, automotive, mechanical, engineering, and construction industries. It also distributes industrial tapes and adhesives; and other products, such as die-cuts, static controls, carrier and cover tapes, cleanroom supplies, abrasives, disposables, wipers and gloves, masks and respirators, and hearing and protective eyewear products. In addition, the company provides value-added services, including AutoCAD drafting, CNC Oxy profile cutting, CNC high definition plasma profile cutting, bandsaw sawing, fiber cutting, milling & grinding, precision machining, steel fabrication work, and welding work services. Further, it offers steel products, such as ferrous and non-ferrous metal products; flat products, including plates, sheets, and coils; and rolled-long products comprising bars, rods, shafts, sections, angles, channels, tubes, and pipes. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
